title: Streamlined and ready for Africa’s growth markets: Q&A with Avanti Communications CEO Kyle Whitehill
summary: SpaceNews spoke with Kyle Whitehill, Avanti’s chief executive officer, to learn more about the British satellite operator’s plans to expand across Africa.

title: Second module docks at China’s space station, large rocket stage tracked in orbit
summary: China added a new experiment module to its space station Sunday, following a high-profile launch from the country’s coastal spaceport.

title: Roman Space Telescope top challenge for new NASA astrophysics director
summary: The person tapped to be the next head of NASA’s astrophysics division says his top priority is to keep the agency’s next large space telescope on schedule and within its budget.

title: Video: SpaceX Falcon 9 over the moon
summary: During SpaceX’s Falcon 9 Starlink mission on July 22, SpaceX captured an incredible video of the rocket flying over the moon. Perhaps...

title: SpaceX continues Starlink deployment with Starlink 4-25 mission
summary: SpaceX launched the Starlink 4-25 mission Sunday, at 9:38 AM EDT (13:38 UTC). A Falcon 9 rocket carried another 53 satellites for the Starlink internet constellation, each with a mass of approximately 300 kilograms. The satellites were deployed into an initial orbit of about 230 by 340 kilometers in altitude at an inclination of 53.2 degrees, separating from the second stage of the launch vehicle slightly more than 15 minutes after liftoff.

title: New science lab for China’s space station launches on Long March 5B rocket
summary: China’s heavy-lift Long March 5B rocket launched Sunday with the second major element of the Chinese Tiangong space station, sending the 25-ton Wentian science module on course for docking at the orbiting outpost.

title: Chang Zheng 5B launches Wentian Laboratory Module
summary: China has launched the Wentian Laboratory Cabin Module on Sunday, July 24 at 06:22 UTC out of the Wenchang Space Launch Site in China. The module is one of two planned for launch this year to China’s Tiangong space station, with the second being the Mengtian module which is slated to launch in October.

title: SpaceX ends busy July with pair of Starlink launches
summary: SpaceX has rounded out its busiest July ever with a pair of Falcon 9 Starlink launches, simultaneously breaking its annual launch record...

title: Vaya Space aims for flight operations next year with STAR-3D vortex hybrid engine
summary: Vaya Space, a developing small satellite and technology company (formerly Rocket Crafters), is deep into the development of their STAR-3D vortex hybrid engine that will be used on the company’s Dauntless rocket.

title: Starlink is now available in 36 countries
summary: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk recently shared that Starlink internet is available in 36 countries. This isn’t just an incredible milestone for SpaceX,...
